post.body: That is funny http://dmfail.com
Thank you. See is sleeping again and seems to be doing better. I think I may lay back down myself.
FYI 1Password is on MacZot for purchase as wel so this is an even better deal. The devs are super for this program, just love'em
- The rest I will enjoy trying out. Thanks again! Merry Christmas to all and to all a goodnight!
I own 1Password the best pwd mgmt app on OS X or any other platform for that matter. I wish I had someone else to give it to.
- I already own iConquer & it is a fun game, so be sure to invite to get that game. Similar to Risk. On MuPromo for purchase
Thank you for a the MAC gifts and iPhone apps my wife and I won. It was great fun, good job!
Shame on you!! SSSHHH! I won't tell anybody. ;-)
awesome, you never know when you are dealing with iPhone apps.
How do we enter the contest?
Do you have a Mac?
Great news! If you have a mac I use 1Password on OS X & therefore on the iPhone. It is the best & on sale at maczot.com
Finally heading to bed after doing some website updates and Facebook updating. G'Night!
Amelia was sick vomiting all night long. Mom is still sleeping but we all slept in late today. Hoping the day gets better.
had a good day with family. Also bought an inversion system to help my back. Heading to bed now, goodnight all!
Wake & ready for a new day. Going to my cousins to visit the family for the holidays.
- We had a great first party at our new house. About 30 people came. Heading to my cousins for a Christmas get together on Sunday.
Enjoyed Sabbath at church, now getting ready for friends to come over tonight.
Experienced communion with God earlier tonight, but heading to bed now to rest my eyes so i'll be ready for Sabbath tomorrow.
track "promo code"
